content: With the new layout of the FHIR spec (the new Modules), I found that the instructions for creating a new resource needed to be updated. So I updated step 10, and added a new step 12. Not sure if that covers all the new changes http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Guide_to_Authoring_Resources#Creating_a_new_resource
thanks - so are you sorted with this? I'm sorry I didn't have time to get to this yet - the last 72 hours have not left me much time to catch up
As long as my updates to the wiki are correct and complete.. yes.
